articles.title: Cloudbursts are causing chaos in parts of India and Pakistan. Here’s what they are - AP News
articles.description: Cloudbursts are causing chaos in mountainous parts of India and Pakistan, with tremendous amounts of rain falling in a short period of time over a concentrated area. The intense, sudden deluges have proved fatal in both countries. A cloudburst occurs when a l…

articles.description: AHA/ACC release new blood pressure guideline
articles.content: Adults should limit sodium to 2,300 mg daily, ideally 1,500 mg, following a heart-healthy plan like DASH with fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy oils. Reduce alcoholless or … [+48 chars]
